channel.title: Research Topics on NarangLab
channel.description: Recent content in Research Topics on NarangLab

item.title: Excited State Dynamics and Open Quantum Systems
item.description: Challenge and Opportunity # Excited-state nanophotonics presents a critical challenge and opportunity as it involves competing degrees of freedom and constraints with coupled electrons, photons, and atomic structures.

item.title: Interactions with Molecules
item.description: Quantum Nature of Light # Chemical reactions are ubiquitous and play a critical role in everyday life.

item.title: Quantum Information Science
item.description: Our work in the quantum information subfield follows the integrated approach to quantum science embodied in the NarangLab.
